triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: TyDi QA is a question answering dataset designed to advance multilingual QA systems.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper applies NLP techniques to multilingual question answering tasks.

triples.name: Linguistic typology
triples.relevance: Linguistic typology is the core principle guiding language selection and diversity in the dataset.
